Note:
Cf. Walther (1963)
XWalther, Hans. Proverbia sententiaque latinitatis medii aevi. 6 vols. Göttingen, 1963-69, no. 24069.
_description: Modest behavior — one quatrain (abab) translating ‘Qui facis ingressum studeas sic esse modestus…’ which precedes it in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.First Lines:
Wan þu makst ingongBeþenk þe so to ben
                    þolmod
NLS18721.Last Lines:
Þat at þin outgongNo man sey of þe but
                    good
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 32.
